title: Notice
content:
wffweb-12.0.8 is released on 09/14/2025, it supports Java 17 or later. However, Java 24 or later is recommended for best performance as it can utilize Virtual Thread to do internal operations. Did you know wffweb contains a basic JSON parser (It is the most efficient way to parse JSON in the world).

Did you know Web Firm Framework is over a decade old framework? As per Maven repository analytics data, 4000+ new wffweb projects are created every month.

wffweb-3 reached EOL so upgrade your project now.

This framework is not associated with any business/organization/company; it's a completely non-profitable independent framework.
